78 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
79 /** test that #OS_StartScheduler calls the relevant FreeRTOS function */
80 void testOS_StartScheduler(void) {
81  vTaskStartScheduler_Expect();
82  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(OS_StartScheduler());
83 }
84 
85 void testvApplicationIdleHookCallsUserCodeIdle(void) {
86  FTSK_RunUserCodeIdle_Expect();
87  vApplicationIdleHook();
88 }
89 
90 /** test that #OS_MarkTaskAsRequiringFpuContext calls the relevant FreeRTOS function */
91 void testOS_MarkTaskAsRequiringFpuContext(void) {
92  vPortTaskUsesFPU_Expect();
93  OS_MarkTaskAsRequiringFpuContext();
94 }
95 
96 void testOS_GetNumberOfStoredMessagesInQueue(void) {
97  OS_QUEUE testQueue = {0};
98  uxQueueMessagesWaiting_ExpectAndReturn(testQueue, 5u);
99  uint32_t numberOfMessages = OS_GetNumberOfStoredMessagesInQueue(testQueue);
100  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(5u, numberOfMessages);
101 }
102 
103 void testOS_SendToBackOfQueueFromIsr(void) {
104  OS_QUEUE testQueue = {0};
105  uint8_t dummyVar = 1u;
106  xQueueGenericSendFromISR_ExpectAndReturn(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, NULL_PTR, queueSEND_TO_BACK, pdTRUE);
107  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(OS_SUCCESS, OS_SendToBackOfQueueFromIsr(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, NULL_PTR));
108 
109  xQueueGenericSendFromISR_ExpectAndReturn(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, NULL_PTR, queueSEND_TO_BACK, pdFAIL);
110  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(OS_FAIL, OS_SendToBackOfQueueFromIsr(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, NULL_PTR));
111 }
112 
113 void testOS_SendToBackOfQueue(void) {
114  OS_QUEUE testQueue = {0};
115  uint8_t dummyVar = 1u;
116  uint32_t ticksToWait = 1u;
117  xQueueGenericSend_ExpectAndReturn(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, ticksToWait, queueSEND_TO_BACK, pdTRUE);
118  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(OS_SUCCESS, OS_SendToBackOfQueue(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, ticksToWait));
119 
120  xQueueGenericSend_ExpectAndReturn(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, ticksToWait, queueSEND_TO_BACK, errQUEUE_FULL);
121  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(OS_FAIL, OS_SendToBackOfQueue(testQueue, (void *)&dummyVar, ticksToWait));
122 }
